synopsis.text: Whenever the pressures of her office job become too much to bear, Retsuko, a diligent red panda, finds solace in an unexpected outlet: death metal karaoke. As an accountant in her dream company, she's constantly burdened with unending tasks and the unreasonable demands of her superiors and colleagues. Despite the facade of perfection and dedication she maintains at work, Retsuko's true release comes in the form of powerful death metal growls at her local karaoke bar. As the stress of her job intensifies, she struggles to keep her unique passion a secret, especially when the urge to sing overwhelms her, even in the office bathroom. Will Retsuko manage to maintain her secret life, or will she find comfort in sharing her love for death metal with others?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
